' is located about 20 minutes from the town of

.  This beach is separated into Esterillos Este and Estrillos Oeste (East & West).  On the far North end there is a small fishing community near the rocky point and on the Southern end you'll find the main estuary, after which the beach is named after is found.  

Esterillos is still very underdeveloped which makes it a quiet and relaxing place to get away from it all.  There are good surf spots along the beach although most people seem to prefer the Oeste side.  The 'Oeste' side is also called Bejuco by locals.
There are several bars and restaurants in Esterillos Oeste that are great. One great local hangout is called The Lowtide Lounge.

value: content=This Beach house is located in Esterillos Oeste (West), 20 minutes from the Los Suenos Resort, and from the beautiful beaches of Playa Herradura, Playa Hermosa, Jaco, Playa Bejuco, and Manuel Antonio.

content=Torre del Tiempo, 2nd floor, Av. Pastor Diaz, downtown across from Banco Nacional, Jaco Beach, +1 801 938-3494 +506 2643-2222, Property management company that offers independently-owned luxury and family, fully equipped vacation rental villas, houses and condominiums around the Central Pacific Coast, in locations such as: Jaco Beach, Playa Hermosa, Esterillos and the luxurious Los Suenos Resort and Marina.
